name: myanmar-dictionary-extension
description: Myanmar Dictionary Extension for Chrome and Firefox

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/chrome-extension dist/firefox-extension dist/tmp
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run copy:base && cp extension/manifests/manifest.chrome.json dist/tmp/manifest.json && mv dist/tmp dist/chrome-extension
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run copy:base && cp extension/manifests/manifest.firefox.json dist/tmp/manifest.json && mv dist/tmp dist/firefox-extension
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && echo 'âœ… Extensions built successfully'
